currentAdr.title: Use single form snake case for package names

body.enhancedMdx:
## Context and Problem Statement

We have to decide one convention for packages / folders naming to achieve more uniformly structured project. 

## Decision Drivers

- Easy to read
- Recommended by other Dart/Flutter devs

## Considered Options

- Snake case single form
- Snake case multiple form

## Decision Outcome

Chosen option: "Snake case single form", because snake case is recommended by Dart in [here](https://dart-lang.github.io/linter/lints/package_names.html). Single form like `asset` will be better than `assets` because the single form is shorter and used by default in a generated project (lib, ios, test, web).
